ValidationRule.description: Checks implementation year if less than current year.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT ( ISBLANK( Implementation_Year_v2__c ) ), ISNUMBER( Implementation_Year_v2__c ), LEN( Implementation_Year_v2__c ) = 4, VALUE( Implementation_Year_v2__c ) < YEAR( TODAY() ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the current or future year.
